response.original_title: TR, Mayor Mitchel, Governor Charles Whitman of New York, and Myron Herrick, 1917
response.overview: Close-up view of New York Governor Charles S. Whitman (1915-1918), Myron T. Herrick, formerly governor of Ohio and United States ambassador to France, and New York City Mayor John P. Mitchel (1914-1917) reviewing a parade of New York National Guardsmen from the balcony of the Union League Club in New York City, Aug. 30, 1917. TR steps forward between Herrick and Mitchel and tips his hat, probably acknowledging applause.
response.title: TR, Mayor Mitchel, Governor Charles Whitman of New York, and Myron Herrick, 1917

titles.title: Theodore Roosevelt, Mayor Mitchel, Governor Charles Whitman of New York, and Myron Herrick, 1917
